description: The Italian prime minister has been in power now for three years. Italy's political experts question the normalization of this leader, who comes from a neo-fascist background. Has her tenure really been accompanied by a moderation of her political views?

description: The Iberian Peninsula's economy is thriving, yet the absence of a budget since 2023 has exposed the deep-seated tensions in Spanish political life and does not rule out general elections being held in 2026, writes historian Benoît Pellistrandi in an op-ed for Le Monde.

headline: In Austria, the rebellion of three nuns from the Goldenstein convent
description: The sisters claim they were financially stripped and forced to leave their religious establishment to move into a nursing home. Thanks to the support of volunteers, they have 'escaped' and have since returned to their former monastery.

headline: In 'Avatar: Fire and Ash,' James Cameron's Na'vi lose faith
description: The third installment of the saga on the planet Pandora finds its inhabitants transformed into nihilist punks, ready to collaborate with their human colonizers.

headline: Madagascar's metalheads lead charge of anger: 'It's easier to make yourself heard when you scream'
description: After three weeks of protest, Madagascar's Generation Z succeeded in toppling those in power on October 14. The uprising drew much of its strength from countercultural circles, chief among them the island's vibrant metal scene. Heirs to a long tradition, Madagascar's metalheads condemn poverty, inequality and the regime's incompetence.

description: Researchers from the Politecnico di Milano claim to have discovered mysterious underground passages beneath the medieval fortress that match sketches by the Italian master. But historians specializing in the period sharply dispute this theory.

headline: BHV department store boss Frédéric Merlin fails to buy iconic Parisian store's building from Galeries Lafayette
description: According to Galeries Lafayette, the acquisition will be carried out by 'an anglophone player with recognized expertise in real estate asset management.'

headline: French PM ups pressure on government to avoid budget deadlock
description: After a joint committee failed to reach an agreement on France's contentious budget bill, the government plans to present a special law on Monday to ensure the continuity of the state.
